---
title: Overview
description: Get started with Oneloop in minutes
mode: "wide"
---

[Oneloop](https://oneloop.ai) is a quick and easy way to add authentication to your API. It provides a simple way to add authentication to your app, and it's easy to get started.

{/* <img className="block" src="/images/hero.png" /> */}
